 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוּל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבִיל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==way, path== (properly as ***flowing along, stretching out ***? compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבִיל‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁבִילָא‎</span>); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבִּים וּשְׁבִילְיךָ֯ בְּמַיִם‎</span> [[[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבִילְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.77.20|Ps 77:20]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ‎</span>); construct (figurative of course of life) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבוּלֵי עוֺלָם‎</span> [[Jer.18.15|Jer 18:15]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבִילֵי‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּרָכִים‎</span>).
